name: DeleteConferenceRecording
description: Delete a recording from your account

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Conference Recording resources to delete.

ConferenceSid.description: The Conference SID that identifies the conference associated with the recording to delete.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Conference Recording resource to delete.
